name: Stuck in the loop (Simex)
description:
Stuck in the loop
Made in 72 hours for LD 47
https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/47/stuck-in-the-loop-1

Stuck in the loop is a game where you power up a generator by TOKYODRIFTING like a badass around it! Zoom around with your upgradeable speed and health skills in this
fun little game.

------------------------------------
Music was made by @YaboiMatoi

A special thank you to @simex and @Ganiester for helping me during the development

------------------------------------
made with:
Unity
photoshop
3ds Max
bfrx

------------------------------------

Me and my usual team are also currently making a full version of our Previous LudumDare submission Socket Punch! https://twitter.com/socketpunch check it out here!
